Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Talman
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Kedzie, 99th, Western & 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Talman.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Kedzie, 99th, Western, then resume their normal on 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Talman.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Chicago
ShortDescription: 146 Inn LS/Mchgn Exp buses temp rrtd SB: Mchgn, Chicago, Stt, Ohio, Mchgn; NB: Mchgn, Ontario, Stt, Chicago, Mchgn; due to police activity at Michigan/Chicago

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Chicago, State, Ohio and Michigan.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago, Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Michigan/Chicago
ShortDescription: EB 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, State, Ohio, Fairbanks, into the terminal, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, State, Ohio, Fairbanks and into the terminal, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
